body: i'm thankful that after an intense day i fell asleep very early again last night and slept for a very long time. i'm thankful to be able to give my body what it needs. i'm thankful for the feeling of being rested and how that feeling, at its best, can seem to permeate every muscle, synapse, and cell. i'm thankful to lie in the bed a bit longer today and try to hold onto that feeling.
